context: PayPal spun off from eBay in July 2015 as an independent public company. The company had 179M active accounts and processed $282B in payments, facing new mobile payment competitors.

competitors.name: Apple Pay
competitors.notes: Apple's mobile wallet launched 2014, threatening PayPal in mobile

competitors.name: Square
competitors.notes: Mobile payments and POS competing with PayPal Here

competitors.name: Amazon Pay
competitors.notes: Amazon's payment option for third-party sites

competitors.name: Venmo (owned)
competitors.notes: P2P payment app acquired by PayPal/Braintree
